home.title: AIVerify
home.subtitle: AI Video Originality Certification & Creation Proof Platform
home.slogan: Prove when it was created. Prove who created it.
home.featuresSubtitle: Trusted evidence infrastructure for AI video creators
home.feature1Desc: Get a trusted timestamp proving when your video was first certified, creating indisputable evidence of creation time.
home.feature2Desc: Unique hash-based fingerprint ensures content integrity. Any 1 bit change will completely alter the fingerprint, enabling tamper detection.
home.feature3Desc: Anyone can verify your certification using the certificate ID or file hash, building trust and transparency.
home.feature4Desc: Download a professional PDF certificate for your records, client presentations, or legal documentation.
home.feature5Desc: Record which AI tools you used (Runway, Pika, Sora, etc.) and preserve your creative process metadata.
home.feature6Desc: Provides creation time and content consistency proof (Authorship Evidence). Not a government copyright registration. This platform does not judge the legality of infringement.
home.pricingSubtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs
home.legalDisclaimer: Legal Disclaimer: This service provides creation time and content consistency proof (Authorship Evidence). It does not constitute government copyright registration or legal judgment. This platform does not judge the legality of infringement. Users must declare that the content is their legal creation.
